info.summary: View, post and manage Zyneon Star your way!
info.name: Star

meta.description:
Zyneon Star is the platform from Zyneon Studios, which was created to create, share, and view articles, resources, and content.

This client is a module/extension for the NEXUS application from Zyneon Studios to integrate Zyneon Star into the app with extended features and tools.
meta.infoCard:
Warning

Zyneon Star is still in alpha - this module is in beta. Please report any issues. (The images are placeholders)
